Description

Revenguard is set in the ancient past in the territory of the Revenguard Kingdom. Your mission is to rescue your best friend who has been kidnapped by very hostile slimes who want to conquer the kingdom of Revenguard and take over the world. Rescuing your little dog won't be easy. Your best friend is being held in a castle that has already been taken over by the slimes. The Slime Lord is also hidden here. However, getting there can be challenging. Along the way, you'll have to solve various tasks, jump from tree to tree, climb mountains or crawl through creepy caves, and most importantly, avoid the slimes who will try to kill you as soon as they see you. Good luck, the Revenguard Kingdom needs you!


Environment

Revenguard offers incredibly varied environments that take you to atmospheric forests, haunted caves, sunny meadows, and a huge castle. Each environment has its own unique charm and brings with it an exciting adventure that awaits you as you explore this fantastic game.

  • Revenguard takes place in beautiful atmospheric forests, haunted caves, sunny meadows, or the huge castle of the Revenguard Kingdom.

  • In the atmospheric forests, you weave through the trees as an intoxicating gust of wind guides you and reveals their hidden secrets.

  • Delve into dark and sometimes haunted caves where dangerous slimes and various traps await you, prepared in the darkness.

  • In the sunny meadows, you will find yourself in a picturesque landscape full of flowers and singing birds. Stroll through the soft grass and admire the majestic mountains looming distantly on the horizon.

  • Explore the hidden and impressive rooms of the Revenguard Kingdom Castle, delve into its rich history, and overcome all obstacles to reach your goal.


    Evil Creatures

    The slimes have taken over the kingdom of Revenguard and kidnapped your best friend. The slimes are very hostile creatures and will try to kill you on sight. Unfortunately, there is no known weapon that can harm them, so your only chance to escape is to run. You have to be quick because the slimes are extremely fast and will chase you every step of the way.

    Gameplay

    Revenguard has very simple controls using the keyboard and mouse. You can customize your interactions with objects in the game to suit your needs.
